listitem.para: You are welcome to file a Bug Report or a Feature Request.
File a bug or a Feature request: https://github.com/saigkill/latex_curriculum_vitae-dotnet/issues.

For feedback on the documentation or this product, you can also send a mail to Sascha.Manns@outlook.de. Make sure to include the document title, the product version and the publication date of the documentation. To report errors or suggest enhancements, provide a concise description of the problem and refer to the respective section number and page (or URL).
